text: (Āyiṉum pōrukkuc cellātatu paṟṟi) antakar mītum kuṟṟam illai muṭavar mītum kuṟṟam illai nōyāḷi mītum kuṟṟam illai - aṉṟiyum evar allāhvukkum, avaruṭaiya tūtarukkum vaḻippaṭukiṟārō, avarai (allāh) cuvarkkaṅkaḷil viravēcikkac ceyvāṉ; avaṟṟiṉ kīḻē āṟukaḷ ōṭikkoṇṭirukkum; āṉāl evaṉ piṉ vāṅkukiṟāṉō, avaṉai (allāh) nōviṉai tarum vētaṉaiyāka vētaṉai ceyvāṉ
